name: BMX Pro - BMX Freestyle game
description:
Brilliant BMX freestyle game for all adrenaline junkies!

Cycle your BMX in fantastic 3D courses full of bowls, half pipes, grinds, jumps and big ramps

Earn skill points to unlock more content, pull some of the most amazing tricks in this adrenaline packed extreme sports game.

Features:
- Half pipe, tail whip, no hander, no footer, bunny hop, 180’s
- Amazing graphics, stunts and box freestyle action
- Huge city with lots of slides, ramps and trick zones.
- Find hidden bonuses, jump on cars and smash objects for points

Ride you BMX freestyle, Jumping，performing various tricks in the air and landing safety.

BMX Freestyle (which, today, encompasses the Dirt, Vert, Park, Street and Flatland disciplines) was created by racers who enjoyed pushing the stylistic limits of what they could do on their bikes.
